description: Ruleset for Ontario FSAs that map to multiple territories. Used to handle edge cases during territory assignment and onboarding.

M1E.notes: North York East vs Scarborough East. Use full address (street-level) to determine correct territory.

L6Y.notes: Brampton Central/Downtown vs Brampton East. Use full address / Google Maps to confirm side of boundary.

K2P.notes: Ottawa West vs Ottawa Central/Downtown. Use full address and map to confirm neighbourhood alignment.

L0H.notes: Whitchurch-Stouffville vs Pickering rural fringe. Use full address; if still ambiguous, escalate for manual review.

K0K.notes: Kingston/Frontenac/Lennox & Addington vs Belleville/Quinte/PEC. Use municipality and full address to decide.

K0M.notes: Peterborough/Kawartha Lakes vs Haliburton/Minden Hills. Use town name and map if needed.

N0P.notes: Chatham-Kent/Lambton vs Essex County (excl. Windsor/LaSalle). Use municipality and map to confirm.

L0R.notes: Hamilton East vs Hamilton West vs Grimsby/Lincoln/West Lincoln. Rural and boundary-heavy; use map pins.

when_not_listed.notes: If an FSA is not in split_fsa_rules, treat the mapping in territories.json / FSA lookup as authoritative.

on_conflict.notes: If automated address verification cannot clearly resolve between territories, escalate for manual decision.
